parameter-group.name: stationmapper
parameter-group.label: Station Mapping (optional)
parameter-group.description: Station mapping is used to resolve tuner information and translate them into user friendly TV station names

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host Address
parameter.description: The IP address or the domain name of the SELFSAT-IP antenna

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval to refresh antenna information (in seconds)

parameter.name: playlistAddress
parameter.label: Playlist
parameter.description: A extended M3U playlist that contains the streams that are provided by this antenna

parameter.name: playlistRefresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval to refresh the playlist (in hours)
